text:
good morning @neal

thank you for all this advices!! 

I did saw those books some time ago, but since you confirmed to me that they're actually pretty good, I will totally get them now 

And If I will have questions or problems, I won't hesitate to ask you 

Thank you again, truly, and have a lovely day

the @ symbol didn't work so don't worry about using it lol. if there is any delay in my responses please bare with me as the notifications on this are not great, so i have to manually check for new messages.

yes those two books are great and should be your bible for compositing. yes feel free to message at any time if you have anything you'd like to know both compositing related or in the general industry and i'll do my best to answer.

oh don't worry, I have absolutely no rush :) 

And I will certainly keep your offer to help in mind, absolutely

so, thank you again and all the best
